resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81718</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81718</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Compound Words</string>
            <string language="es">Palabras compuestas</string>
            <string language="ga">Comhfhocail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammengesetzte Wörter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots composés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Palavras Compostas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole composte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθετες λέξεις</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">6 worksheets on  compound words. Worksheets 1-4 are of the type where pupils add two small words together to make new word. Worksheets 5-6 ask pupils to break compound word into two smaller words.</string>
            <string language="es">6 Hojas de trabajo sobre palabras compuestas. Hojas de trabajo 1-4, son del tipo donde los alumnos ponen dos palabras pequeñas juntas para crear una nueva palabra. Hojas de trabajo 5-6, se pide a los alumnos que dividan palabras compuestas en dos palabras</string>
            <string language="ga">Sé bhileog oibre ara chomhfhocail. I mbileoga oibre 1-4 cuireann na daltaí dhá fhocal bheaga le chéile chun focal nua a dhéanamh. I mbileoga 5-6 briseann daltaí comhfhocail chun dhá fhocal níos lú a dhéanamh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">6 Bogen auf zusammengesetzten Wörtern. 
Bogen 1-4 sind vom Typen, in dem Pupillen zwei kleine Wörter 
zusammen sind hinzufügen, um neues Wort zu bilden. Bogen 5-6 
bitten Schüler, zusammengesetztes Wort in zwei kleinere Wörter zu 
brechen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">6 tableaux sur des mots composés. Les 
tableaux 1-4 sont du type où les pupilles ajoutent deux petits mots 
ensemble pour faire le nouveau mot. Les tableaux 5-6 demandent 
à des élèves de casser le mot composé en deux plus petits mots.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">6 folhas em palavras compostas. As folhas 
1-4 são do tipo onde as pupilas adicionam duas palavras pequenas 
junto para fazer a palavra nova. As folhas 5-6 pedem que os 
alunos quebrem a palavra composta em duas palavras menores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">6 fogli di lavoro sulle parole composte. I 
fogli di lavoro 1-4 sono del tipo in cui le pupille aggiungono insieme
due piccole parole per fare la nuova parola. I fogli di lavoro 
5-6 chiedono agli allievi di rompere la parola composta in due più 
piccole parole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">6 φύλλα εργασίας στις σύνθετες λέξεις. Τα φύλλα
εργασίας 1-4 είναι του τύπου όπου οι μαθητές προσθέτουν δύο 
μικρές λέξεις για να κάνουν μαζί τη νέα λέξη. Τα φύλλα 
εργασίας 5-6 ζητούν από τους μαθητές για να σπάσουν τη 
σύνθετη λέξη σε δύο μικρότερες λέξεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
